game.name: Mahjong Soul
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: 언제 어디서나 즐기는 리치 마작, ‘작혼’의 세계로 초대합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mahjong Soul is an online game that adopted the classic Japanese Mahjong gameplay. Here, you can hone your mahjong skills with players from worldwide or spend leisure time with friends, bond with various charismatic characters, and experience an abundance of unique stories.

reviewHighlights.text: ANANISINI SİKİM BÖYLE OYUNUN ŞANS SİSTEMİNİN AMINA KODUMUN CİNLİLER. HER GİRDİĞİM ODADA 1 TANE ŞANSI YÜKSEK DİĞER 2 KİŞİNİN ŞANSI DÜŞÜK DİĞERİDE BİLME...
I never thought I would enjoy Mahjong but after watching enough of it from tohers playing Yakuza, I thought I would give it a try. Low and behond this...
